package com.example.capstone2.util
/** * Centralized provider for statusId -> human-readable name. * Keep this in sync with server-side friendlyStatusLabel(). */ object StatusNameProvider { fun getNameFor(statusId: Int): String = when (statusId) { 1 -> "Subject for approval" 2 -> "Delivery boy pickup" 3 -> "Waiting for customer drop off" 4 -> "Pending" 5 -> "Processing" 6 -> "Rider out for delivery" 7 -> "Waiting for customer to claim" 8 -> "Completed" 9 -> "Rejected" 10 -> "Request Accepted" 11 -> "Partially Accepted" 12 -> "Milling done" 13 -> "Delivered" else -> "Unknown status #$statusId" } }
